protein.specific_function: Selenium-binding protein which may be involved in the sensing of reactive xenobiotics in the cytoplasm. May be involved in intra-Golgi protein transport

reference.reference_text: Chang PW, Tsui SK, Liew C, Lee CC, Waye MM, Fung KP: Isolation, characterization, and chromosomal mapping of a novel cDNA clone encoding human selenium binding protein. J Cell Biochem. 1997 Feb;64(2):217-24.
